label: Web Studio
text: About project: mobile-first adaptive landing page to web studio, profile page.

label: Movies
text: About project: Created basic routing for movie search and storage application.

label: Phonebook
text: About project: application of the phone book with authorization, the ability to add and delete new contacts.

label: Image Finder
text: About project: this is an image search application by keyword, it uses the public image search service Pixabay.

label: Search for countries
text: About project: a small application for searching data about a country by its partial or full name. Used by Rest Countries API.
